column4: so like, I've been trying to install ubuntu but it looks like the partitioning keeps freezing up.
had you tried to partition for a RAID, by any chance?

it was a guess ... I ran into some partitioning trouble, and it seemed to have been caused by my having started to set up a RAID. Hm ... you could try the Alternative CD instead of the Desktop ... sometimes that works where the D. doesn't
